ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.: A condition that differs from the usual physical or mental state.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
A condition that differs from the usual physical or mental state.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An often asymptomatic developmental abnormality of the cervical spine.  It is characterized by the hypoplasia of the odontoid which appears as a stubby peg of an odontoid process.  Symptoms may develop affter minor trauma and include localized neck pain, atlantoaxial instabilty, and transient or permanent neurologic manifestations.

Concepts.definition: An often asymptomatic developmental abnormality of the cervical spine. It is characterized by the hypoplasia of the odontoid which appears as a stubby peg of an odontoid process. Symptoms may develop after minor trauma and include localized neck pain, atlantoaxial instability, and transient or permanent neurologic manifestations.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Ventricular; of or relating to a ventricle (of the heart or brain).: An abnormal increase of cerebrospinal fluid in the ventricles of the brain.

Concepts.definition: Of or relating to a ventricle (of the heart or brain).
A disorder characterized by an abnormal increase of cerebrospinal fluid in the ventricles of the brain.
